analysis.description:
GoldenUnionCrowdsale.purchase (/unique_chucks/25/0x2f5e078353e781ef9a9b17c2e8e30d3652d6cb83.sol#322-346) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- profitOwner.transfer(valueEther) (/unique_chucks/25/0x2f5e078353e781ef9a9b17c2e8e30d3652d6cb83.sol#343-345)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0x2f5e078353e781ef9a9b17c2e8e30d3652d6cb83.sol:
	Contract GoldenUnitToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0x2f5e078353e781ef9a9b17c2e8e30d3652d6cb83.sol#222-228)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

GoldenUnionCrowdsale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x2f5e078353e781ef9a9b17c2e8e30d3652d6cb83.sol#272-280) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(amount) (/unique_chucks/25/0x2f5e078353e781ef9a9b17c2e8e30d3652d6cb83.sol#279-280)

GoldenUnionCrowdsale.giveTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x2f5e078353e781ef9a9b17c2e8e30d3652d6cb83.sol#281-291) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_newInvestor,value) (/unique_chucks/25/0x2f5e078353e781ef9a9b17c2e8e30d3652d6cb83.sol#290)

GoldenUnionCrowdsale.takeTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x2f5e078353e781ef9a9b17c2e8e30d3652d6cb83.sol#291-308) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.acceptTokens(_Investor,value) (/unique_chucks/25/0x2f5e078353e781ef9a9b17c2e8e30d3652d6cb83.sol#305-307)

GoldenUnionCrowdsale.saleTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x2f5e078353e781ef9a9b17c2e8e30d3652d6cb83.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0x2f5e078353e781ef9a9b17c2e8e30d3652d6cb83.sol)
GoldenUnitToken.INITIAL_SUPPLY should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x2f5e078353e781ef9a9b17c2e8e30d3652d6cb83.sol#182-184)
